We have an urgent requirement for PowerBuilder/Java Developer with the EAServer Enterprise Application Framework (DDS EAF) position with our client.Job Title: PowerBuilder/Java Developer with the EAServer Enterprise Application Framework (DDS EAF)Duration: 12 monthsLocation: RemoteJob Description: This is 100% Remote opportunity. I have attached a form to be duly filled by the qualified candidates with all details. The client will not look into the resume of the candidate. Total Work Experience : 10+ Years PowerBuilder/Java Developer• Provide two lead development resources to rewrite the EAF framework java classes that currently support the JSP-to-Jaguar calls (via CORBA) into C#.• Deploy code through the DEV, QA, and Production environments at appropriate times in the development lifecycle.*• Provide code review and knowledge transfer sessions with NYS IT staff.• Provide Remediation of any post deployment issues.Minimum Qualifications: a)Minimum of 6 years of experience successfully migrating 3-tier PowerBuilder Systems to modernized, supported platforms. b)Minimum 6 years of experience specifically with the EAServer Enterprise Application Framework (DDS EAF). c)Possess excellent communication skills including, but not limited to: (1) the ability to provide highly effective knowledge transfer; and (2) the ability to provide written documentation of architecture diagrams, technology roadmaps, technical specifications, procedures, technical recommendations, testing results and project management documentation including risks, issues, and schedules. d)Possess a demonstrable ability (based on the successful completion of previous projects) to successfully work effectively in a remote environment while maintaining a high level of collaboration with all project team members.
